emails.subject: The story behind ProteinCookies üìñ
emails.preheader: Why we started and what makes us different
emails.html:
Why we started and what makes us different  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 

üç™ ProteinCookies

The Story Behind ProteinCookies üìñ

Hey there!

I wanted to take a moment to share why I started ProteinCookies and what we're all about.

Like you, I was frustrated with protein cookies recipes that:

  • Tasted dry and chalky üò¨
  • Had vague measurements ("1 scoop of protein")
  • Didn't include accurate nutrition info
  • Required weird ingredients I couldn't find

So I decided to create something better.

Every recipe on ProteinCookies is:

  • ‚úÖ Measured in grams for precision
  • ‚úÖ Calculated with USDA nutrition data
  • ‚úÖ Tested multiple times for perfect results
  • ‚úÖ Made with ingredients you can actually find

Our mission is simple: make high-protein baking accessible, delicious, and accurate for everyone.

Explore All Recipes

Tomorrow, I'll share the 3 biggest mistakes people make with protein cookies (and how to avoid them).

Talk soon! üëã

The ProteinCookies Team

You're receiving this email because you signed up for ProteinCookies.

emails.subject: 3 mistakes ruining your protein cookies üö´
emails.preheader: Avoid these common errors for perfect results
emails.html:
Avoid these common errors for perfect results  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 

üç™ ProteinCookies

3 Common Protein Cookies Mistakes üö´

Hey there!

After helping thousands of people make better protein cookies, I've noticed the same mistakes come up again and again.

Here's how to avoid them:

‚ùå Mistake #1: Using Too Much Protein Powder

More protein powder ‚â† better results. Too much makes your cookies dry and crumbly. Stick to the recipe ratios!

‚úÖ Fix: Never exceed 30-40% protein powder by weight in your dry ingredients.

‚ùå Mistake #2: Overbaking

Protein cookies continue cooking after you remove them from the oven. Taking them out when they look "done" means they'll be overdone.

‚úÖ Fix: Remove when centers look slightly underdone. They'll firm up as they cool.

‚ùå Mistake #3: Using Volume Measurements

"1 scoop" of protein powder can vary by 10-15g depending on how packed it is. This throws off your macros AND texture.

‚úÖ Fix: Always weigh your ingredients in grams. A $15 kitchen scale is the best investment you'll make.

All our recipes are designed to help you avoid these mistakes with precise gram measurements and tested baking times.

Browse Recipes

In a couple days, I'll introduce you to some of our sister sites in the Protein Empire. You might find some new favorites!

Happy baking! üç™

The ProteinCookies Team

You're receiving this email because you signed up for ProteinCookies.

Amazing results from our community  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 

üç™ ProteinCookies

Look What Our Community is Making! üì∏

Hey there!

I wanted to share some of the amazing results from our ProteinCookies community. These photos always make my day!

"I've tried so many protein cookies recipes and these are BY FAR the best. My kids don't even know they're healthy!"

‚Äî Sarah M.

"Finally, recipes with actual gram measurements! My macros are always spot-on now."

‚Äî Mike T.

"I meal prep a batch every Sunday. Game changer for hitting my protein goals!"

‚Äî Jessica L.

Want to see more? Follow us on Instagram where we share community creations, tips, and behind-the-scenes content!

Follow on Instagram

What's Next?

This is the last email in our welcome series, but we're just getting started!

Going forward, you'll receive our weekly newsletter featuring:

  • üÜï New recipes as they're published
  • üí° Protein baking tips and tricks
  • üèÜ Community highlights
  • üéÅ Exclusive offers and early access

Thanks for being part of the ProteinCookies community. Now go make something delicious!

Happy baking! üç™

The ProteinCookies Team

P.S. Made one of our recipes? Tag us @proteinempire on Instagram ‚Äì we love seeing your creations!

empireAnnouncement.html:
Discover all 12 specialized protein recipe sites  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 

üç™ Protein Empire

üè∞ Welcome to the Protein Empire!

Hey there!

Did you know that ProteinCookies is part of something bigger?

We're proud to introduce the Protein Empire ‚Äì a family of 12 specialized recipe sites, each dedicated to a different type of high-protein treat!

üéØ Our Mission

Make high-protein baking accessible, delicious, and accurate for everyone ‚Äì with gram-based measurements and USDA-verified nutrition data.

Explore the Empire:

Muffins

High-protein muffins recipes

empireAnnouncement.plainText:
Welcome to the Protein Empire!

Hey there!

Did you know that ProteinCookies is part of something bigger?

We're proud to introduce the Protein Empire ‚Äì a family of 12 specialized recipe sites!

Our Mission: Make high-protein baking accessible, delicious, and accurate for everyone.

Explore the Empire:
- Muffins: https://proteinmuffins.com
- Pancakes: https://proteinpancakes.co
- Brownies: https://proteinbrownies.co
- Bread: https://protein-bread.com
- Bars: https://proteinbars.co
- Bites: https://proteinbites.co
- Donuts: https://proteindonuts.co
- Oatmeal: https://proteinoatmeal.co
- Cheesecake: https://proteincheesecake.co
- Pizza: https://proteinpizzas.co
- Pudding: https://proteinpudding.co

Each site offers:
- 25+ macro-verified recipes
- Free downloadable recipe packs
- Printable recipe cards
- Weekly new recipes

Visit the Empire Hub: https://highprotein.recipes

Happy exploring!
The Protein Empire Team
